input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs - Beef Flavor

Item keywords:
Formulated specifically for dogs
Does not foam
Controls plaque
Fights bad breath
Beef and poultry flavors
input_text.Response A: The Galaxy Trend 3 from Samsung combines the quality you expect from Samsung with a range of features that is unequaled by any other cell phone.  With a Dual Sim support, Dual Core 4GB 1.2Ghz CPU and Quad Band 2G, 3G 900/2100 MHz spec design supported by a 1800 mAh long life battery this phone will reliably serve you.  The list of features on the Trend 3 is nothing short of amazing with its 768 MB Ram 4GB ROM microSD slot, 5 mega pixel no flash LED rear camera and auto focus, this unlocked phone is compatible with all GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile.
input_text.Response B: Dental health is critical for everyone, even man's best friend.  Petrodex Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is formulated specifically for dogs.  The non-foaming formula helps control plaque and fights bad breath in your pooch.  Offered in poultry or beef flavors, there's something for every pet's palette to ensure acceptance.
